attributes.action: Stop/or let parents opt out from LGBT education in primary school.
attributes.additional_details: Currently schools are still teaching LGBT relationships, claiming under equality act.Those who have religious beliefs,will constantly have to explain to children what they are being taught at school is against their beliefs.So this may eventually create homophobia in children as they grow,which we do not want.It is better to teach this in secondary school as they will have a better understanding.
attributes.background: LGBT relationship education including under equality,should be delayed untill secondary school.Let children be children.This is confusing children and they do not see any differences in anyone,they see everyone as equal no matter who they are.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You can find out more about what the Government proposes should be taught in relationships classes and what would be a decision for individual schools here:

https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/SN06103/SN06103.pdf

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
